scripts.build:polyfill: npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill.cjs && npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill-compat.cjs && npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill-modern.cjs
scripts.build:sky: npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky.js && npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-compat.js && npx rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-modern.js
